dcterms:description: APmed is a corpus of clinical text reports in French, extracted from the AP-HP data warehouse. It includes 320 free text reports such as medical prescriptions, discharge reports, examinations, observation reports, and emergency visits. The dataset is designed for drug information extraction, including drug name recognition and their relations with fields such as frequency, dosage, duration, condition, and route. It also contains annotations for events related to drug prescriptions.
dcterms:title: APmed
